title: Development Session - Navbar, Homepage, Badges, Begin.md
description: Session feed capturing progress on site layout, navigation bar, badge system, and the beginner onboarding guide.

blocks.title: Navbar refactor and feature additions
blocks.summary: Simplification, hover dropdown tools menu, links added: Spec, News, Manual, Join, About, Tools with subitems.

blocks.title: Homepage badges integration
blocks.summary: Display of certified badges, embedded HTML snippet, alignment with MCP design aesthetic, final tweaks for spacing and copy tone.

blocks.title: Begin news article
blocks.summary: Markdown content explaining LLM vs human-facing layer, ./well-known as intent/capability surface, adoption of llmfeed.json.

blocks.title: Badge gallery and feed
blocks.summary: New badge visual set, structured explanation in llmfeed, ZIP download, organized by type + level, snippet section added.

blocks.title: Globals.css rewritten
blocks.summary: Simplified white background, no gray body, clean transitions and heading styles matching homepage layout.

blocks.title: llmfeed export for certified badges
blocks.summary: Feed template filled with badge metadata to allow signed export and documentation.
